      • onScanStopped

        Callback when scan stopped

      • onConnected

        public abstract void onConnected(BluetoothDevice device)
        Callback when device is successfully connected
        参数:
        device - Device connected

      • onConnectionFailed

        public abstract void onConnectionFailed(BluetoothDevice device,
                                        java.lang.String macAddr,
                                        int errorCode)
        Callback when connecting device failed
        参数:
        device - the device to connect
        macAddr - MAC address
        errorCode - Error code to indicate why failed @link BluetoothGatt

      • onDisconnected

        public abstract void onDisconnected(BluetoothDevice device,
                                    java.lang.String macAddr,
                                    int errorCode)
        Callback when device disconnected
        参数:
        device - device disconnected
        macAddr - MAC address
        errorCode - Error code to indicate the reason why disconnected

      • onAvailableServices

        public abstract void onAvailableServices(BluetoothGatt gatt,
                                         int status)
        Callback when Bluetooth GATT services found
        参数:
        gatt -
        status -

      • onLoginState

        public abstract void onLoginState(java.lang.String macAddr,
                                  boolean state)
        Callback for login state
        参数:
        macAddr - MAC address of the device to login
        state - Login state true：login succeeded；false：login failed

      • onAddToMeshState

        public abstract void onAddToMeshState(java.lang.String macAddr,
                                      boolean state)
        Callback when device added to BLE mesh
        参数:
        macAddr - MAC address of the deviced added
        state - true：successfully added to the mesh；false：failed

      • onBleDeviceStatusChanged

        public abstract void onBleDeviceStatusChanged(byte addr,
                                              boolean isOnline,
                                              byte level,
                                              byte temColor,
                                              byte[] value)
        Callback when device status changed
        参数:
        addr - lower byte of short address in BLE mesh
        isOnline - indicates whether the device is active in the mesh
        level - Brightness 0-255，0 means OFF
        temColor - color temperature 0 - 255
        value - all bytes from the device

      • onBleDeviceAddrMessage

        public abstract void onBleDeviceAddrMessage(int target,
                                            int newAddr,
                                            byte[] value)
        Callback for modifying or obtaining device address requests
        参数:
        target - Old address before modify, or target address in obtain address call
        newAddr - New address
        value - All bytes returned by the device

      • onDeviceGroupMessage

        public abstract void onDeviceGroupMessage(int target,
                                          byte[] msg)
        Callback for obtaining device grouping information
        参数:
        target - Device address
        msg - Grouping information: one device can be part of up to 8 groups, so msg has total 8 bytes, each byte corresponds to the lower byte of a group id, (the higher byte of a group id is always 0x80, and need to be appended to be used as group reference) if the device is in less than 8 groups, the remaining bytes are 0xFF.

      • onDeviceTimeRecived

        public abstract void onDeviceTimeRecived(int target,
                                         int year,
                                         int month,
                                         int dayOfMonth,
                                         int hour,
                                         int minute,
                                         int second)
        Callback for device time requests
        参数:
        target - Device address
        year - year
        month - month
        dayOfMonth - day of month
        hour - hour
        minute - minute
        second - second

      • onAlarmMessage

        public abstract void onAlarmMessage(int target,
                                    byte[] msg)
        Alarm information callback
        参数:
        target - Device address
        msg - Alarm information msg[0] 0xa5 0xa5 indicates the information is valid msg[1] alarm index msg[2] alarm parameters bit0―bit3 operations, 0: off; 1: on bit4―bit6 alarm type， 0：Day；1：WEEK bit7alarm enable, 1 means enabled msg[3] If alarm type = DAY，this byte indicate month, value 1-12 if alarm type = WEEK, this byte is reserved msg[4] if alarm type=DAY, this byte is date; if alarm type=WEEK, this byte corresponds to days in a week, bit0 - bit6 Sunday - Saturday, bit 7 reserved，need to set to 0 msg[5] hour msg[6] minute msg[7] second msg[8] total number of alarms in this device.
        另请参阅:
        #sendAddAlarmMessage(int, byte[], int)} NOTE:all-zero bytes for value means no alarm defined.

      • setMeshnameAndPassword

        public void setMeshnameAndPassword(java.lang.String meshname,
                                   java.lang.String password)
        Change device meshname and password
        参数:
        meshname - new meshname
        password - new password

      • startScanningWithMeshNames

        public void startScanningWithMeshNames(java.util.List<java.lang.String> meshNames,
                                       int timeOut)
        Start scan
        参数:
        meshNames - meshname filter list, only scan devices with name in the filter list, if empty scan everything
        timeOut - scan timeout, if set to 0, scan won't timeout

        stop scan

      • sendPassCmd

        public void sendPassCmd(int target,
                        byte[] params)
        E3 Generic command
        参数:
        target - target device address(0x0000 - 0x7FFF)
        params - command content to be transferred，params can be at most 10 bytes

      • sendOnOffCmd

        public void sendOnOffCmd(int target,
                         boolean isOn)
        On/Off command
        参数:
        target - target address (can be device address, or group id)
        isOn - true：ON; false：OFF Device status change will invoke callback@see #onBleDeviceStatusChanged(byte, boolean, byte, byte)

      • sendAdjustCmd

        public void sendAdjustCmd(int target,
                          int level,
                          int ww,
                          int cw,
                          int r,
                          int g,
                          int b,
                          int w)
        Command to change brightness, color temperature, RGB, RGB+W, or W
        参数:
        target - target address (can be device address, or group id)
        level - brightness level: 0-255
        ww - color temperature: 0-255
        cw - color temperature: 0-255
        r - red: 0-255
        g - green: 0-255
        b - blue: 0-255
        w - white: 0-255 Note: if only try to change level, need to set ww, cw, r, g, b w to 0; if try to change RGB or RGBW, needs to set ww, cw to 0; if try to change color temperature, need to set r,g,b and w to 0.

      • sendIdentifyCmd

        public void sendIdentifyCmd(int target)
        request the device to identify itself
        参数:
        target - target address, can only be a device address（0x0000 - 0x7FFF） Note: when received this command, device will blink 3 times slowly.

      • sendGroupingCmd

        public void sendGroupingCmd(int target,
                            int groupId)
        Device grouping
        参数:
        target - Address, can only be a device address (0x0000 - 0x7FFF)
        groupId - group id (0x8001 - 0xFFFF), each device can join at most 8 groups, suggest to use 0x8001 - 0x8008 as group ids Once this operation is done, a callback will return new grouping information. see onDeviceGroupMessage(int, byte[])

      • sendDeviceAddrCmd

        public void sendDeviceAddrCmd(int target,
                              int newaddr)
        Change device short address
        参数:
        target - current device address (0x0000 - 0x7FFF). if target = 0x0000, it means current connected device
        newaddr - new address (0x0001 C 0x7fff) Note: After this operation, no need to call sendReadDeviceAddrCmd if you'd like to know whether the new address is set. There will be an automatic notify callback @link #onBleDeviceAddrMessage(short, short, byte[])

      • sendReadDeviceAddrCmd

        public void sendReadDeviceAddrCmd(int target)
        Read device address
        参数:
        target - if target is a device address 0x0000 - 0x7FFF: read the address of the device if target is a group id 0x8000 - 0xFFFF: read all device addresses in this group

      • sendReadGroupCmd

        public void sendReadGroupCmd(int target)
        Read device grouping information
        参数:
        target - Device address: 0x0000 - 0x7FFF Grouping information will be returned through callback onDeviceGroupMessage(int, byte[])

      • sendRemoveGroupById

        public void sendRemoveGroupById(int target,
                                int groupid)
        Remove device from group
        参数:
        target - device address: 0x0000 - 0x7FFF
        groupid - group id: 0x8001 - 0xFFFF. If groupid=0xFFFF, then remove this device from all groups After this operation is done, new grouping information will be returned through callback @see onDeviceGroupMessage(int, byte[])

      • sendSetTimeCmd

        public void sendSetTimeCmd(int target,
                           int year,
                           int month,
                           int dayOfMonth,
                           int hour,
                           int minute,
                           int second)
        Set time
        参数:
        target - target address (device address or group id). If target=0xffff (most common use case), all devices will set time accordingly.
        year - year
        month - month
        dayOfMonth - day of month
        hour - hour
        minute - minute
        second - second if time setting is sucessful, device will blink 3 time slowly; otherwise, blink 3 times quickly.

      • sendGetTimeCmd

        public void sendGetTimeCmd(int target)
        Get device time
        参数:
        target - device address; if target = 0x0000, it means currently connected device; Note: time information can only be obtained one device by one device to avoid heavy data traffic. device time will be returned through callback @see onDeviceTimeRecived(int, int, int, int, int, int, int)

      • sendAddProfileForDevice

        public void sendAddProfileForDevice(int target,
                                    int groupId,
                                    int profileId,
                                    int level,
                                    int ww,
                                    int cw,
                                    int r,
                                    int g,
                                    int b)
        Add a scene to a device with given parameters
        参数:
        target - device address (0x0001 - 0x7FFF)
        groupId - group id (0x8000 - 0xffff)
        profileId - scene id (1-16)
        level - brightness level (0 - 255, 0 OFF, 255 brightest)
        ww - warm level (0 - 255)
        cw - cold level (0 - 255)
        r - red (0 - 255)
        g - green (0 - 255)
        b - blue (0 - 255)

      • sendAddProfileCmd

        public void sendAddProfileCmd(int target,
                              int profileId)
        Add a scene, save current status of all devices in a given group for the given scene
        参数:
        target - group id (0x8000-0xFFFF)
        profileId - scene id (1-16), one group can have up to 16 scenes.

      • sendUpdateProfileCmd

        public void sendUpdateProfileCmd(int target,
                                 int profileId)
        Update a scene, save current status of all devices in a given group for the given scene
        参数:
        target - group id (0x8000-0xFFFF)
        profileId - scene id (1-16)

      • sendRemoveProfileByIdCmd

        public void sendRemoveProfileByIdCmd(int target,
                                     int profileId)
        Remove a scene
        参数:
        target - group id (0x8000-0xFFFF)
        profileId - scene id (1-16)

      • sendApplyProfileCmd

        public void sendApplyProfileCmd(int target,
                                int profileId)
        Apply a scene
        参数:
        target - group id (0x8000-0xFFFF)
        profileId - scene id (1-16)

      • sendReadAlarmMessageCmd

        public void sendReadAlarmMessageCmd(int target)
        Read alarm information
        参数:
        target - device address; if target = 0x0000, it means currently connected device; Note: alarm information can only be obtained one device by one device to avoid heavy data traffic. 闹钟列表返回@see onAlarmMessage(int, byte[])

      • sendAddAlarmMessage

        public void sendAddAlarmMessage(int target,
                                byte[] alarm,
                                int alarmId)
        Add an alarm item
        参数:
        target - target address, if target = 0xFFFF, then all devices execute this command
        alarm - total 6 bytes alarm[0] alarm parameters bit0―bit3 operations, 0: off; 1: on bit4―bit6 alarm type， 0：Day；1：WEEK bit7alarm enable, 1 means enabled alarm[1] If alarm type = DAY，this byte indicate month, value 1-12 if alarm type = WEEK, this byte is reserved alarm[2] if alarm type=DAY, this byte is date; if alarm type=WEEK, this byte corresponds to days in a week, bit0 - bit6 Sunday - Saturday, bit 7 reserved，need to set to 0 alarm[3] hour alarm[4] minute alarm[5] second
        alarmId - alarm index, one device can have up to 10 alarms, alarmId can range 1 - 10; Alarm Id will be assigned if set alarmId to 0, the following callback sendReadAlarmMessageCmd(int) will return the alarm settings information, including the assigned alarm index.

      • sendRemoveAlarmById

        public void sendRemoveAlarmById(int target,
                                int alarmId)
        Remove an alarm item
        参数:
        target - target address, if target = 0xFFFF, then all devices execute this command
        alarmId - alarm index, one device can have up to 10 alarms, alarmId can range 1 - 10 if alarmId = 0xff, it means to remove all alarm items.

      • sendEnableAlarm

        public void sendEnableAlarm(int target,
                            int alarmId)
        Enable an alarm item
        参数:
        target - target address, if target = 0xFFFF, then all devices execute this command
        alarmId - alarm index, one device can have up to 10 alarms, alarmId can range 1 - 10

      • sendDisenableAlarm

        public void sendDisenableAlarm(int target,
                               int alarmId)
        Diable an alarm item
        参数:
        target - target address, if target = 0xFFFF, then all devices execute this command
        alarmId - alarm index, one device can have up to 10 alarms, alarmId can range 1 - 10

      • sendUpdateAlarmMessage

        public void sendUpdateAlarmMessage(int target,
                                   byte[] alarm,
                                   int alarmId)
        Change alarm settings
        参数:
        target - target address, if target = 0xFFFF, then all devices execute this command
        alarm - alarm[0] alarm parameters bit0―bit3 operations, 0: off; 1: on bit4―bit6 alarm type， 0：Day；1：WEEK bit7alarm enable, 1 means enabled alarm[1] If alarm type = DAY，this byte indicate month, value 1-12 if alarm type = WEEK, this byte is reserved alarm[2] if alarm type=DAY, this byte is date; if alarm type=WEEK, this byte corresponds to days in a week, bit0 - bit6 Sunday - Saturday, bit 7 reserved，need to set to 0 alarm[3] hour alarm[4] minute alarm[5] second
        alarmId - alarm index, one device can have up to 10 alarms, alarmId can range 1 - 10

      • openMeshOnlineSatatus

        public void openMeshOnlineSatatus()
        Get status from all devices device status will come back through callback @link #onBleDeviceStatusChanged(byte, boolean, byte, byte)

      • sendRemoveDeviceCmd

        public void sendRemoveDeviceCmd(int target)
        Remove device from BLE mesh
        参数:
        target - device address: 0x0000 - 0x7FFF, if target = 0x0000, it means currently connected device. Note: this command will do factory-reset for the given device
